Help System

Menu for the XCL12 Package

Menu for the XCL12 Package

  • eqxy - Get (x,y) from a table of (ra,dec) given the pltsol coeff.
  • extgst - Extract selected columns stars from a list of tables.
  • fttostt - Convert a list of FITS tables to STSDAS tables.
  • intrep - Find coordinates at the cursor.
  • makewcs - Write the WCS on the image header based on the plate sol.
  • pltsol - Calculate plate solution from table of positions.
  • pxcoord - List pixel coordinates of guide stars.
  • regions - Produce guide star region files (as STSDAS tables).
  • sgscind - Search the guide star catalog index.
  • stgindx - Copy the catalog index to an STSDAS table.
  • targets - Find target coordinates based on guide stars.
  • xyeq - Get (ra,dec) from a table of (x,y) given the pltsol coeff.

  • (Type "help gasp option=sysdoc" for more information about the gasp package).
